reviews.text: The food is absolutely amazing, 10/10 would recommend!!
Theeee best food ever.
fire food

Ordered online, and I was pleased with the delicious food and speedy service. However, I think they could improve by offering larger portions. I ordered the three-meat platter and mac and cheese, but the jerk chicken came a bit smashed with some bone fragments. That was unexpected! Still, I‚Äôll give it 4 stars!
Good Carribean food, a juicy plantain was enough for me. A lot of variety of dishes.I will be back I want to try the sorrel wings!
This food was amazing!!! There was so much love, flavor, and thought put into it. It was so satisfying and it filled me up!
Awesome üëç food everything was so delicious I forgot to take a full picture üòãüòã

Best food ever. Love it
Delicious great vibes.  Great atmosphere.

The food was amazing üòã Every meal we had was full of flavor and cooked to perfection. The menu has an extensive variety of options, along with great customer service üôåüèæ from Chef Swick.  Would definitely recommend üëåüèæ.
So soooo delicious I‚Äôve gotten food from here 3 days in a row everything is so fresh the workers are so nice I dream about this food
man, this was one of the best tasting meals I‚Äôve had in a while. God bless the chefs who put so much effort into making the food

Wow! I would have left a picture of the food but just ate it so fast. Delicious food at a great price. Can‚Äôt wait to try everything on the menu! And I just found out they‚Äôre opening a bar next door! üòú
Amazing fresh food. Must try
Food is fire
The food is amazing! Especially the macaroni pie. Also the service is amazing, when I enter, whoever is there greets me kindly, and the restaurant space and area is nice.

It was amazing.
the food is delicious and the service is great - everyone is very friendly!
Great service and great tasting food. The lunch special is an unbeatable deal and you get so much for what you pay!
Great 2goodtogo meals. Delicious and big portions.
Food is amazing the owner is amazing
THE BEST FOOD.

Mr. Flava did it again!!! Great food at great prices. I lived in brooklyn for a few months and would hit this spot with my girlfriend weekly. Highly recommend doing the too good to go app here as well because you get a big bowl of food for $5.99. Best thing available is the jerk chicken!

Picked up lunch here today, and everything about the experience was great.  The service was very attentive and friendly.  We ended up getting three of the seafood specials: chili mango shrimp, curry lobster, and curry crab.  All three were very delicious, as well as all the sides (rice, chow mien, plantains).  Ginger strawberry lemonade is also great.  Only downside is that there isn't a large seating area to eat it, but that's pretty common for most places around here.
GREAT TASTING FOOD,GOOD SELECTION OF DISHES TO CHOOSE FROM.COLD DRINKS.
The the jerk chicken, rice and pease and cabbage with plantain is a must try. I will definitely be returning.  Great customer service as well!
First time visit. I'm currently eating the curried chicken with rice/peas and veggies. It's delicious! The curry flavor is just right for my taste buds. As Arnold says, I will be back.
Absolutely delicious. Had some veggies, rice and peas, fried fish, grilled chicken, and stewed chicken I believe. It also came with some fried sweet plantain. Can‚Äôt wait to come back. I

I rate this establishment,  the owner is really cool and treats his customers right!! Food was good, I had the curry shrimp and lobster made to order.  My only recommendation is more gravy on the rice which I always ask for but forgot to this time.  Other than that I will definitely be visiting again.

I've enjoyed everything except the fried fish.
The fried fish is too greasy for my liking.
Food was made and packed with love. It came hot even in the cold and rain. Ordered vegetable pasta with mango chili salmon, and the ginger strawberry lemonade. Thank you üôèüèΩ

For the price and the quality it is worth it ,a little hidden but its a gem for food .My friends loved their sorrel wings and their fish was well seasoned and properly portioned.

1st time I visited I had the macaroni pie and salmon its was delicious the salmon was soooo good. I also had the vegetable spaghetti and oxtail o wow that was also great overall the food is excellent definitely will eat there again

The Salmon is the best thing I‚Äôve tried so far!!

Okay so this spot up the street from my job just opened and since they have I‚Äôve ordered different things from the menu. The stew chicken is okay, the oxtails are not bad but the Salmon!!! Yesss, Ima try the fried chicken and hot wings next but I just had to share because this place is good!

Their drinks are great too! The sorrel has ginger! (I mention bc too many places don‚Äôt add it ü•∫)

Also just a tip, get the fried rice and not the rice and peas (it tastes better). Your welcome!
